title: Sign up to the Telegraph's Brexit WhatsApp group for all the latest news, exclusives and analysis
text:
You can now receive the very latest news, developments and exclusive analysis on Brexit from the Telegraph Politics team, direct to your phone via our all new Brexit WhatsApp group.

Journalists from the Telegraph's newsroom will provide daily updates, bringing you the inside track, fly-on-the-wall analysis and the pick of the Telegraph's political content as Brexit negotiations enter this most critical phase.

Senior journalists from the Telegraph team will bring you access to a Brexit focused channel with sharp, insightful and exclusive analysis and comment you can't get anywhere else.

Signing up is easy, just follow the steps below.

Important note - your phone number will only be used to receive Brexit alerts from The Telegraph. Your phone number will not be exposed to people who use the service and will not be used for marketing purposes of any kind.

I have WhatsApp installed on my mobile

Tap here from your mobile. You will see a service message asking if you want to open WhatsApp. Tap ‘Open’. You will be taken through to WhatsApp and will see ‘Start’ in the message field. Tap ‘send’. You will receive a welcome message asking you to add our WhatsApp phone number to the contacts on your mobile. You will need to do this in order to continue receiving updates from us. The process is now complete - we hope you enjoy our Brexit updates.
